category.name: iSphere Job Log Explorer for WDSCi 7.0

category-def.name: iSphere for WDSCi 7.0 (Base Component)
category-def.label: iSphere for WDSCi 7.0 (Base Component)
category-def.description: iSphere for WDSCi 7.0. Base component of the iSphere plug-in.

category-def.name: iSphere TN5250J for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.label: iSphere TN5250J for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.description: iSphere TN5250J emulator for WDSCi 7.0. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for WDSCi 7.0".

category-def.name: iSphere STRPREPRC Utility for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.label: iSphere STRPREPRC Utility for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.description: Plug-in that extends the context menu of the Lpex editor with options to add/remove a STRPREPRC header. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for WDSCi 7.0".

category-def.name: iSphere Job Log Explorer for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.label: iSphere Job Log Explorer for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.description: Plug-in that adds an editor for exploring job log spooled files. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for WDSCi 7.0".

category-def.name: iSphere Journal Explorer for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.label: iSphere Journal Explorer for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.description: Plug-in that adds views for exploring output files of the DSPJRN command. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for WDSCi 7.0".

category-def.name: iSphere Additions for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.label: iSphere Additions for WDSCi 7.0
category-def.description: Optional LPEX editor additions for WDSCi 7.0. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for WDSCi 7.0".
